name: Cookie Clicker Collector - Best Free Idle & Incremental Game
name_original: Cookie Clicker Collector - Best Free Idle & Incremental Game
description:
Drag your finger to collect cookies!

Expand your cookie empire with Cookie Trees, Robots, a Cookie Volcano and more!

Can you reach a TRILLION cookies before your friends?!

Get a head start now!

Twitter: @CookieCollector
Reddit: r/CookieCollector
